item.title: Panasonic Link2Cell Bluetooth DECT 6.0 Expandable Cordless Phone System with Answering Machine and Enhanced Noise Reduction – 5 Handsets – KX-TGE675B (Black)

Item Weight 3.15 pounds
ASIN B08NWCW5XH
Item model number KX-TGE675B
Batteries 10 AAA batteries required. (included)
Customer Reviews

Best Sellers Rank #832 in Office Products (See Top 100 in Office Products)
#7 in Landline Phones
Date First Available September 26, 2020
Manufacturer Panasonic

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $169.99 - $149.78
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:41:36 UTC – Details)


This 5 Handset Cordless Phone has a digital answering maching and dual keypad. Hear who’s calling from across the room with talking Caller ID announcements in English and Spanish from the based unit and cordless handsets. Easily block up to 1000 telemarketers with one-touch dedicated call block buttons on base and handsets. Link to Siri, Google or S Voice with the Remote Voice Assist.
BI Lingual Caller ID: Talking caller ID audibly announces caller information in either English or Spanish from the telephone’s base unit and cordless handsets when you can’t view the screen
One Touch Telephone Call Block: Register up to 1000 numbers with one touch call block on the cordless phone base unit & cordless handsets; Compatible with hearing Aid T Coil (TIA 1083 compliant)
Panasonic Voice Paging: More than a traditional intercom, voice paging sends clear simultaneous announcements to all cordless handsets at once; Talk Time: 10 hours max
Enhanced cordless phone sound quality noise reduction automatically suppresses background interference while enhancing voice tones for clearer conversation on the base unit & cordless handsets
Secure Long Range phone Signal DECT 6.0 wireless technology offers a long range cordless phone and is ideal for homes and apartments with thick walls

KX-TGE675B

5 Handsets Cordless Phone System with Link2Cell

Make working from home easier and stress-free with the smart, easy-to-use KX-TGE675B cordless phone system. Connect to a cell phone via Bluetooth for landline-level clarity on mobile calls. Robust,1-step Call Block helps you avoid nuisance callers, and many other features provide daily convenience.

Link2Cell Technology

Make and receive cellphone calls

Pair up to 2 cell phones via Bluetooth with the base unit to get increased call clarity and reliability, avoiding cell dead zones in your home. The handsets alert you when your cell phone receives incoming calls and texts and allow you to make and receive mobile phone calls with landline clarity.

Automated Call Block + One-Touch Call Block

Talk to people, not computers. Automated Call Block stops robocallers from getting through by prompting callers to press “1” to connect their call. Plus, you can easily block other unwanted callers (up to 1000 numbers) with the touch the Call Block button

Designed for Ease-of-Use

This phone is packed with easy-to-use design features. A large 1.88-in display + large button backlit keypad makes it easy to dial and see call info. Turned off the ringer? A bright LED flashes when there’s an incoming call. Volume too low? Use the side volume button to quickly adjust, even mid-call

Expand Your System

Keep additional handsets virtually anywhere you need in your home, expanding your phone system up to 6 cordless handsets (sold separately).

Digital Answering System

Missed a call? Get message notifications even if you're away from home, or retrieve messages easily from the handset; up to 18 minutes of record time.

Noise-Free Talking & Listening

Noise reduction technology lets you hear the voice of the person you are talking to more clearly.

Store Important Numbers

Phonebook stores up to 100 important numbers. Caller ID displays up to 50 entries.

Bilingual Taking Caller ID

Caller ID displays in English or Spanish and announces caller information in the language you choose, so you never miss an important call.

Long Battery Life with Low Battery Alert

Enjoy up to 10 hours talk time and 5 days of standby on handsets (while in eco mode). And, you never have to worry about the handset running out of power - audible alerts and visual icons make sure you know when it's time to charge.

Panasonic Cordless Phones Features Comparison

KX-TGE675B

KX-TGE66x Series Phones

KX-TGE64x Series Phones

KX-TGE63x Series Phones

Date First Available May 25, 2016

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $49.99 - $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:38:21 UTC – Details)

From the brand

ABOUT ANCEL

ANCEL is committed to solving automotive aftermarket

problems cost-effectively,efficiently and conveniently.

Our Vision

We strive to make friends with our customers with excellent products and quality services, and to be the company most trusted by our customers.

Our Mission

To provide professional, efficient and high quality automotive diagnostic products so that every car owner around the world can enjoy a better life made possible by technology.

Our Value

The company constantly strives for product quality, technology, design and sustainability and adheres to the spirit of people-oriented and innovative efforts to make great contributions in the field of automotive technology.

Black Friday Deals

EVAP SMOKE MACHINES SERIES

HEAVY TRUCK SCAN TOOL SERIES

CAR BATTERY TESTER SERIES

CEL Doctor: The ANCEL AD310 is one of the best-selling OBD II scanners on the market and is recommended by Scotty Kilmer, a YouTuber and auto mechanic. It can easily determine the cause of the check engine light coming on, quickly read and clear diagnostic trouble codes, read live data & hard memory data, view freeze frame, I/M monitor readiness and collect vehicle information. Instead of taking car to mechanic shop, you can use it to check the trouble code and show code definition by yourself.
Sturdy and Compact: Equipped with a 2.5 foot cable made of very thick, flexible insulation. It is important to have a sturdy scanner as it can easily fall to the ground when working in a car. The AD310 OBD2 scanner is a well-constructed device with a sleek design. It weighs 12 ounces and measures 8.9 x 6.9 x 1.4 inches. Thanks to its compact design and light weight, transporting the device is not a problem. The buttons are clearly labelled and the screen is large and displays results clearly.
Accurate Fast and Easy to Use: The AD310 scanner can help you or your mechanic understand if your car is in good condition, provides exceptionally accurate and fast results, reads and clears engine trouble codes in seconds. If you want to find out the cause of the check engine light, this device will let you know immediately and fix the problem right away without any car knowledge. No need for batteries or a charger, get power directly from the OBDII Data Link Connector in your vehicle.
OBDII Protocols and Car Compatibility: Many cheap scan tools do not really support all OBD2 protocols. This is not the case with the AD310 scanner as it can support all OBDII protocols such as KWP2000, J1850 VPW, ISO9141, J1850 PWM and CAN. This device also has extensive vehicle compatibility with 1996 US-based, 2000 EU-based and Asian cars, light trucks, SUVs, as well as newer OBD2 and CAN vehicles both domestic and foreign. Check compatibility with your vehicle model before purchasing.
Home Necessity and Worthy to Own: This is an excellent code reader to travel or home with as it weighs less and it is compact in design. You can easily slide it in your backpack as you head to the garage, or put it on the dashboard, this will be a great fit for you. The AD310 is not only portable, but also accurate and fast in performance. Moreover, it covers various car brands and is suitable for people who just need a code reader to check their car.


Previous page

  1. Read & clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs), identify and address check engine light (CEL) issues.

  2. Just plug it into your car's OBD II port, turn on the ignition, and you are ready to go.

  3. Works on most 1996 and newer vehicles (cars, light trucks, minivans and SUVs) sold in North America.

  4. Even a beginner can operate this device, no car knowledge required.

  5. Insulated cables and a rugged plastic case protect your device from the elements in your workplace.

Next page

1 Main Features 2 Connectivity 3 Vehicle Compatibility 4 Easy To Use 5 Quality Construction

6 Extra Features You Should Know About

Previous page

  1. Enhanced Functions

    It can do essential work like resetting monitors, CEL issues, and clearing codes. It can also read live data, collect vehicle information, freeze data and display code definitions on the screen.

  2. Impressive Build Quality

    Each product must undergo a 48-hour aging test before leaving the factory. This helps reduce the chance of components on the PCB falling off during shipping and extends the life of the product.

  3. Patent-Protected

    All ANCEL product designs have independent patents and intellectual property rights, and the products also comply with CE, FCC and other relevant certification standards.

  4. Cost-Effectiveness

    Instead of going to a mechanic, car owners can do some basic maintenance themselves by learning some basic skills and buying the right tools like the AD310 scanner, which can cut costs significantly.

  5. Exhaustive Car Checkups

    With ANCEL AD310 OBD2 scanner, you can read and clear trouble codes in any OBD2-compliant vehicle, domestic or foreign, as long as it was manufactured after 1996, in Europe and Asia after 2000.

  6. SMOG Check Helper

    You can use the AD310 OBD2 scanner to make sure the monitor has been set before you take it to emissions test, helps you pass a vehicle SMOG check easily.

Next page

A battery or battery charger is not required. Once connected to your vehicle's 16-pin OBDII DLC, the unit will turn on and prompt you to start the ignition. If your vehicle has a check engine light on, the AD310 scanner is the first tool that can help you determine the cause and find a solution.

Find More ANCEL AD310 Scanner Reviews On Social Media

Where's the OBDII interface?

The OBD2 port is often under the dash, or under a panel below the handbrake in the central console.

How to get started?

Key operation: 1. turn the ignition on without starting the car; 2. Start the car.

Keyless operation: 1. press start button - press again (do not press brake pedal) - insert tool and read; 2. press brake pedal and start button.

Why I can't erase the fault code?

The fault causing the fault code to show will need to be repaired first then code can be erased.

Will it diagnose ABS or SRS?

Unfortunately, no. The main function of AD310 scanner is to detect the engine system, read and clear the fault codes, but Ancel AD610 can do ABS and SRS.

What should I pay attention to before buying?

Two things you should know: 1. it works only on cars with 12V battery; 2. your car must be standard OBD II protocol (16pin DLC).

More Other Products from ANCEL Store

Product Description

Down to the finest detail

LG UHD TV provides vibrant color and accurate detail with Active HDR. Enjoy your favorite films in the same quality as the original with multi HDR formats including HDR10 and HLG.

A View That’s Naturally Better

LG HD TVs are made to impress with clear picture quality. With Dynamic Color, all your favorite content will be natural and vibrant.

Find your entertainment with ease

Entertainment access made easy. LG’s fan-favorite webOS platform delivers streaming simplicity. Featuring streaming apps like Netflix, Hulu, Sling, Prime Video and more. A huge library of content and streaming services are all there at your fingertips.

Dynamic color never disappoints

Advanced image processing adjusts color for richer, more natural images. Enjoy the beauty of nature’s true colors on your TV screen.

WebOS

LG LED HD Smart TV 2021 + Premium 2 Year Extended Protection Plan

LG LED HD Smart TV 2021 + Premium 2 Year Extended Protection Plan 2 Year Accidental Television Extended Protection

At Beach Camera we pride ourselves on providing the best TV Bundles at the best prices. All of the items we include in our bundles are brand new and of the highest quality. They provide you with everything you need to take your Smart TV to the next level!

As an Authorized Dealer all TVs purchased from us come sealed in their original box & includes Full Manufacturer Provided Protection

2 Year Accidental Television Extended Protection

Whether it’s part of your home entertainment system, or simply for watching movies and shows, people enjoy watching TV. However, sometimes accidents can occur that can break, or drastically impact the performance of the TV. This includes dropping the TV while moving or mounting, and kids hitting or knocking the TV over. It even protects you from burn-in, something not typically covered by the OEM. Plus, if something happens to your remote control, you can ask for a hot swap replacement without question.

2 Year Accidental Television Extended Protection Features

Accidental Damage coverageImpact DamageDropping while moving or mounting the TVFrom kids playing ball in the houseBurn in covered – usually not covered by the OEMRemote Control replacement – hot swap, no question askedTech Support Included – initial product setup and/or configurationAuthorized service dispatched by Consumer Priority Service

ENHANCE EVERY SCENE – LG’s Quad Core Processor gives you a smooth, crisp viewing experience with enhanced contrast, color and black.
WebOS – Entertainment access made easy. LG’s fan-favorite webOS platform delivers streaming simplicity. Featuring streaming apps like Netflix, Hulu, Sling, Prime Video and more. A huge library of content and streaming services are all there at your fingertips.

2 Year Accidental Television Extended Protection

Whether it’s part of your home entertainment system, or simply for watching movies and shows, people enjoy watching TV. However, sometimes accidents can occur that can break, or drastically impact the performance of the TV. This includes dropping the TV while moving or mounting, and kids hitting or knocking the TV over. It even protects you from burn-in, something not typically covered by the OEM. Plus, if something happens to your remote control, you can ask for a hot swap replacement without question.

2 Year Accidental Television Extended Protection Features

  • Accidental Damage coverage
  • Impact Damage
  • Dropping while moving or mounting the TV
  • From kids playing ball in the house
  • Burn in covered - usually not covered by the OEM
  • Remote Control replacement - hot swap, no question asked
  • Tech Support Included - initial product setup and/or configuration
  • Authorized service dispatched by Consumer Priority Service

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. (as of Nov 29,2022 10:05:41 UTC – Details)


The holidays are here and ‘tis the season to decorate your home but string lights are a struggle. Hanging lights is really hard work and takes too much time. Untangling them from the box is a pain and going out in the cold high up on a ladder quickly makes your joyous ho-ho-hos turn into bah-humbugs. When one bulb breaks, you need to check them all! Worse yet, during the day, your home’s appearance is ruined by ugly wires everywhere. But not anymore! From the number one laser decorating brand in the world comes the brand-new Star Shower Ultra 9 Laser Light Show, now with an incredible NINE different beautiful decorative light patterns for you to choose from. Star Shower Ultra 9 is the ORIGINAL laser light system that immerses your entire home from top to bottom with a galaxy of THOUSANDS of spectacular red and green lights! And it’s so easy! Just plug it in and turn it on. Your home can transform from dull to dazzling with a magical three-dimensional light field of beautiful crisp bright lights. Better yet, with Star Shower, you can have lights way up high on your house where no string light could ever reach. Star Shower even works on shrubbery and trees – higher than you could ever reach – making your home and yard look more festive than ever! Star Shower Ultra 9 covers up to 3200 square feet. For spectacular results use two or more Star Shower Ultra 9 units!
New 2022 Star Shower Model: From the makers of the best-selling holiday lights projector comes the newest, most innovative way to shower your home indoors and outdoors with thousands of brilliant, shining electric lights to create a winter wonderland of color
Fast, Easy Holiday Decorations: Holiday decorating with string lights is a tangled mess and if one light blows, they all go out; ditch the old holiday decorations with Star Shower Ultra 9 light projector, the fastest, easiest way to project thousands of festive laser lights onto your house
9 Light Patterns: Don’t be stuck with the same holiday decorations for all 25 days of Christmas; Star Shower Ultra 9 has 9 different patterns of holiday lights, so you can pick a new Christmas lights pattern every week or choose your favorite to shower your home through the holidays
3 Color Combinations: The AS SEEN ON TV Star Shower Ultra 9 outdoor lights and indoor lights projector features three different light combinations; choose from red and green lights together, only red, or only green and change color combinations with the press of a button
Still, Motion, or Blinking Laser Lights: Customize your laser light show with still, motion or blinking lights; Try the motion lights setting to enjoy a cascading, moving lights show dancing across your house, or use static mode and fall in love with the magical galaxy of still stars
